content: **knitted wrist warmers in drops babymerino or drops fabel the piece is worked bottom up in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ find the silverveil hat pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #silverveilcuffs drops design pattern bm-122 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits wrist circumference 15-16-17 cm length 24-25-26 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-100 g colour 22 light grey or use drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 114 light pearl grey **needles** drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 28 stitches in width and 38 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 2 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
